General.Name: Electronics Mart India Limited
General.Description: Electronics Mart India Limited operates as an electronic retailer in India. The company offers large appliances, such as televisions, refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners; phone, tablets, fitness tracker, and smart watches; and small appliance, IT and other products including laptops, printers, coolers, geysers, personal computer, cables, screen guards, headphones, bluetooth speakers, ceiling fans, personal care devices, kitchen hob, chimney, water purifies, rice cookers, and mixer grinders. It sells its products under the Bajaj Electronics, IQ, Kitchen Stories, Audio & Beyond, and Easy Kitchens brands. Electronics Mart India Limited founded in 1980 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
